FuncDef:
The nat static-mapping command creates or enters the static source tracing algorithm view.
The undo nat static-mapping command exits from the static source tracing algorithm view.
By default, the static source tracing algorithm view is not created.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To create or enter the static source tracing algorithm view, run the nat static-mapping command. In the static source tracing algorithm view, you can configure the private network address pool, public network address pool, port range, port size, and their relationships based on the static source tracing algorithm.
Precautions
Before deleting the static source tracing algorithm view, delete all the existing configurations in the view.
